UPDATE stock_info SET industry = 'Technology' WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE investment_decisions SET decision = 'Buy' WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';

UPDATE stock_info SET headquarters_location = 'New HQ' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE investment_decisions SET confidence_level = confidence_level + 10 WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision = 'BUY'

UPDATE investment_history SET action = 'SELL' WHERE action_date < '2022-01-01';
